main.name: Shakthi Ganesh
main.bio: Inquisitive and results-oriented Engineer specializing in the dynamic intersection of Programming, Cloud technologies, Scripting, and CI/CD automation. Skilled in leveraging Gen AI, modern tools and practices to create impactful solutions rapidly and make data driven decisions.
main.contactmessage: This contact section is under development and will be functionable soon

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Senior Associate, Software Developer
description: Built a CI/CD pipeline in Jenkins to automate the Flutter build release process for Android and iOS apps using shell scripting.
Developed a Jenkins script to deploy code in the desired environment from the target repository.
Wrote a Python script to fetch logs from the server and parse essential data using regex.
Coordinated quality testing with the assurance team and partnered on resolving defects.
Reported and addressed deployment issues, debugging serverless logs in CloudWatch and server logs in EC2 instances.
Contributed to a University Management System Application and built customer-facing frontend modules.
Created a landing page using React, Material UI, and Tailwind CSS, embedding a widget built with external libraries like Formik.
Developed a single-page application in React to perform CRUD operations for faculty management.
